attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is really simple, everyone loves Jeremy Clarkson, and only Tony Blair loves Gordon Brown. Jeremy would be a better PM. Gordon has raised gas prices, called off an early election, and who would forget about the credit crunch. Jezza would make sure that all fast cars are avalable to the locals and to add that on top, lower fuel prices.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
